attributes.action: Sack the Speaker Michael Martin for his incompetency, bias and bringing the Parliament into disrepute.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker of the house of Commons, Michael Martin, by his incompetency, bias and complete disregard for the neutrality of the Office of Speaker has brought himself, Parliament and democracy into disrepute. His willingness to bring the Police into into Parliament on several occasions and his disregard the necessity of whistle-blowers undermines democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
